test.name: Verify if Amazon "HomePage" is loaded successfully

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.
